resources.string: Hi! This is SmokeSMS, because you have not started a conversation with this contact, I decided to use it and give you a small guide:

To start a conversation, you and the person you want to chat need to generate a private and public key, just enter \"/key\" in the chat and the keys will be generated. Then all you have to do is click on the public keys sent by each other. To decrypt a message sent by another person, just click on the message
